front.title: SIP INFO Method for Event Reporting

abstract.t: This document describes the use of the SIP INFO Method forcommunicating mid-call events in SIP [1] sessions. Two new MIMEtypes are described, according to the rules defined in RFC 2046 [2],for use in the INFO message. These media types can be used within aSIP INFO message to request, and report, event detection between SIPnetwork entities. Emphasis is placed on DTMF signaling tocommunicate user indications when using SIP between a Media GatewayController (MGC) and a SIP application.
